Subject: Strangers with one goal
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

X-Mailer: Unknown sub 103

 Valtron landed infront of the wrecked ship. Hknew that something was wrong 
here. Why had they not been destroyed. Could it be that somehow the autobots 
survived or maybe it was all a trick. All he could do was wait. He turned to 
see three mettalic horsemen arrive. They must be those preds he had heard 
about. But where was the fourth? Then he turned to see two destrons arrive. 
And he could see some following them. This was not enough however he knew. Hw 
was sure the maximals would have to send someone to help. It was their life's 
on the line.
